archimate:BusinessObject.name: FloatingTerminationPoint
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: "This object class represents a TP without a physical layer that behaves both like a PTP and a CTP. Floating Termination Points (FTPs) are contained in managed elements as PTPs. Note: The value of tpMappingMode for FTPs considers exclusively mapping on the server side. See R_TMF518_NRF_I_0011."
